correctness.rationale: The extraction contains numerous untraceable or incorrect values and misses additional ALD processes described in the article. Key issues: (1) Multiple processes missing: the article reports ALD of SiO2 (DIPAS + Ar/O2 plasma, 100 W, 250 °C) and Al2O3 (TMA + H2O, 200 °C) in addition to IGZO; only IGZO is extracted. (2) Misassigned parameters for IGZO: plasma power 100 W is only specified for SiO2, not IGZO; IGZO deposition temperature is not reported, yet 200 °C (for Al2O3) is used; reactor pressure, dosing/purge times, flow rates, saturation, nucleationPeriod, growth-per-cycle, and number of cycles are all fabricated/not traceable. (3) DeliveryMethod incorrectly set to photolithography/etching (this is patterning, not precursor delivery). (4) SupercycleDesign incorrectly models the IGZO supercycle: uses repeated ‘InGaZnO’ instead of InOx/GaOx/ZnO subcycles and includes a fractional count (1.3), which is not a valid subcycle count; sequence is not aligned with the reported cation ratio usage. (5) Material properties largely ungrounded: refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap, resistivity, carrier density (“C-PER-M3”), uniformity, conformality, roughness, and density are not reported in the article; “Hall measurements” are not mentioned. (6) DeviceProperties: mobility (27.52 cm2/V·s) and Vth (1.07 V) match device E, but subthreshold swing is wrong by 1000× due to unit mismatch—article reports 0.24 V/dec, while extraction gives 0.24 mV; on/off ratio is not reported. (7) FilmComposition: atomic ratio 2:1:1.3 (RBS) is correct, but elementalConcentration set to 1% is meaningless/unreported. (8) Schema semantics issues: carrierGas/purgingGas given without source; supercycle counts should be integers and compounds should be separated; deliveryMethod misused. Properties to correct/review: add separate ALD processes for SiO2 and Al2O3; fix IGZO plasma power/temperature (or leave unspecified), remove fabricated timing/flow/pressure/GPC/cycle data unless reported; correct supercycleDesign to InOx/GaOx/ZnO with plausible integer subcycle counts and sequence; correct SS to 0.24 V/dec (or 240 mV if schema forces mV); remove or justify material-property values with cited methods; correct deliveryMethod; remove unreported on/off ratio and film electrical properties; fix elementalConcentration.

completeness.rationale: The extraction is largely incomplete and contains many non-traceable or incorrect values. Key issues: (1) Missing processes: The article describes at least three distinct ALD processes that must be represented as separate process objects—PEALD IGZO (DADI/TMGa/DEZ with Ar/O2 plasma), ALD SiO2 (DIPAS + Ar/O2 plasma at 100 W, 250 °C), and ALD Al2O3 (TMA + H2O, 200 °C). Only one IGZO process is provided. The stacked GI (SiO2 + Al2O3) used for device E is also not captured as a separate ALD step. (2) Hallucinated parameters: Growth per cycle, number of cycles, dosing/purge times, flow rates, reactor pressure, saturation, nucleation, uniformity, conformality, optical constants (n, bandgap), resistivity, carrier density, roughness, film density, and on/off ratio are not reported in the article and are thus not traceable. (3) Incorrect assignments: 100 W plasma power and 200 °C temperature are attributed to IGZO, but the article specifies 100 W for SiO2 PEALD and 200 °C for Al2O3; the IGZO deposition temperature is not given. Pressure is not reported. DeliveryMethod is incorrectly set to a lithography/etch step, not an ALD delivery method. (4) Supercycle design is misrepresented: subcycles are labeled as “InGaZnO” with non-integer counts (including 1.3) and no In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO sequence; the article only provides a cation ratio (2:1:1.3), not subcycle counts or sequence. (5) ReactantSelection grouping is semantically wrong: the three metal precursors are all tied to a single “InGaZnO” compound instead of separate entries for InOx, GaOx, and ZnO; co-reactant is not specified per subcycle. (6) Device metrics unit error: SS is reported as 0.24 V/dec in the article but encoded as 0.24 with unit mV; it should be 240 mV if using mV units. (7) Some values are correct (substrate glass, IGZO thickness 20 nm, amorphous phase, device structure, and cation ratio 2:1:1.3), but overall, many fields are incorrect or ungrounded. To improve completeness, add separate ALD processes for SiO2 and Al2O3 with correct temperatures, precursors and reactants; correct IGZO parameters to only what the article states; rework supercycle to reflect In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO subcycles if reported (otherwise omit); fix SS units; and remove or justify all parameters not traceable to the article.
